live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39782.summary: Some customers in the Southview area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39782.title: July 20 –  Medicine Hat (Southview) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
